title: Response to Return Request
passage:
Dear Ms. Garcia,

We have received your request to return the damaged item from your recent order (#99821). We apologize for the -------(131.) you experienced when you opened the package. 

According to our records, the item was damaged during transit. -------(132.). We will send a replacement unit to your address today at no additional cost. 

Please use the -------(133.) shipping label to return the defective product to our warehouse. You can drop it off at any authorized shipping center. -------(134.), your replacement order will be delivered within three business days. 

We value your business and hope to serve you better in the future.

questions.explanation: 定冠詞 the の後の目的語として名詞が必要です。(C) disappointment（落胆・残念な思い）が正解です。

options: Your order has been canceled as requested.
Please accept our sincere apologies for this error.
The item you ordered is currently out of stock.
Our return policy lasts only for thirty days.
questions.explanation: 不備があったことへの謝罪を述べる (B) が、前後の文脈（配送事故 → 代わりの品を送る）に最もフィットします。
「同封された配送ラベル」という意味にするために、過去分詞で名詞を修飾する (C) enclosed が正解です。
「（返品手続きを進めてもらう）一方で、代替品は3日以内に届く」という並行する状況を示す (A) Meanwhile が適切です。
